document.full_text: luke donald birdied two of his last three holes for a 1-over 72 and a share of the lead at the bmw pga championship with italian teenager matteo manassero after saturday's third round.
document.title: manassero, donald share the lead at wentworth
lines_and_colors: luke donald birdied two of his last three holes for a 1-over 72 and a share of the lead at the bmw pga championship with italian teenager matteo manassero after saturday's third round.
